fullplot: A dedicated scientist, aided by his clueless wife, rolls up his shirt sleeves and tries to save the world from a radioactive monster, curious space aliens, an evil scientist and a crabby skeleton in this send-up of the best of the B movies of the 1950's.
plot: A bad scientist and wife, a mad scientist and skeleton, two aliens and their escaped pet are all searching for the elusive element "atmospherium".
title: The Lost Skeleton of Cadavra

tomatoes.consensus: Lost Skeleton is clever at spoofing B-movies, but the joke isn't sustainable for its running time.
